current.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
current.custom_size_chart_content:
How to Measure

Waist Measurement: Bend to one side to find natural indentation in torso. This is your natural waist. Run tape around natural waistline, keeping tape parallel with floor and one finger between body and tape for a more comfortable fit.

Hip Measurement: Stand on a level surface with feet together. Measure around fullest part of hips and bottom (approximately 7"-9" below waistline), keeping tape parallel with floor.

settings.message_box1:
Sinus Survival

Sinus Survival was developed to identify and eliminate the root causes of your sinus symptoms and to heal inflammation.
settings.message_box2:
Pharmacy & Compounding

Our full-service pharmacy has provided prescription drugs for over 50 years, and custom compounds that include vitamins, minerals and pharmaceuticals.

settings.banner_4_content:
Consultation Services

We have a diverse team of experts including licensed nutritionists, nutrition educators, naturopathic doctors, and herbalists.

Our specialized wellness portal allows for easy scheduling and greater communication and support from your health coach.

Book a FREE Consultation! Order Lab Testing Online NOW!

settings.excluisve_left_content:
Listen, watch or read weekly discussions with health experts in integrative, personalized, and functional medicine. Discover how to reach your optimal health.

Go to Humanized
settings.excluisve_right_content:
Your source for information about healthy nutrition, getting in shape, and improving your overall mental and emotional well being.

Go to the Blog

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to support@halothemes.com

settings.practitioner_content:
Practitioner Brands

Practitioner brands are respected by physicians and healthcare practitioners because of the clinical research that has been conducted, and the quality, purity, and effectiveness of the ingredients.

Learn More

settings.testimonial_content: " Village Green Apothecary has a large variety of supplements, herbal and homeopathic remedies of excellent quality as well as staff that is knowledgeable, friendly, and willing to assist customers.

" I set up a consult with one of their experts and was immediately hooked up with a wealth of information and guidance. I am loving the fact I can approach my health's needs with a more natural approach.
" Village Green Apothecary has the largest array of nutritional and physician grade supplements that I've ever seen. Their staff is extremely friendly and helpful!”
" What I especially like is how reliable your Pathway products are. No junk. And whenever I have asked for advice, it has been careful and helpful.”
" Very good experience. Very nice representative on the phone. Order came quickly! I continue to use this company because of the great customer service

settings.text-box-pdf: You can also use these handy charts as references:

settings.right-text:
Village Green Apothecary has specialized in custom compounding of vitamins, minerals and prescription drugs for over 30 years. While most compounding pharmacies handle drugs, fewer handle nutrition solutions, and only a handful like Village Green have specially trained pharmacists that handle BOTH nutrition and drugs.

Individualized compounds offer some distinct advantages over mass-produced bottled products, such as:

  • Simplifying a nutritional program
  • Providing accurate, tailor-made dosages
  • Reducing the number of capsules needed daily
  • Giving more options for dosage forms such as liquids, creams, etc.
  • Elimination of non-natural fillers, binders, dyes and other possible allergens
settings.left-side-text:
Our compounds are of superior quality, easy to order, and many are covered by insurance plans. A custom compound normally takes 2-4 days to prepare.

Custom compounds are prepared on orders from a nutritionist or physician, like a regular prescription. Some physicians who regularly prescribe individualized compounds include OB/GYNs, family care doctors, allergists, pediatricians, and dermatologists. Veterinarians also use custom compounds for their pet patients.

An interesting note: prior to mass production of drugs in the 1960s, most prescriptions required compounding by a druggist or apothecary.
settings.justify-text:
NOTICE: We no longer accept prescription refills online. Please contact our pharmacy, 
  to place your refill order.
settings.justify-text-link:
Pharmacy refills. Email us or call 301-530-0800 (press 5).  
 Compounding refills: Email us or call 301-530-0800 (press 4).

settings.text-box2: What areas of health are included?
settings.right-text:
• Supplement Review
  • Custom Compounding
  • Personal Wellness Plans & Support
  • Drug/Nutrient Interactions & Depletions
  • Lab Results Interpretation
  • Sleep Support
  • Pain Management
  • Digestive Health
  • Food Allergies & Sensitivities
  • Cardiovascular health
  • Hormone Balance
  • Stress
settings.left-side-text: During your visit, your personal wellness coach will work with you to create an individual health plan that encourages and supports your goals for improved health and well-being. We can help you with recommendations for nutritional supplements, diet and lifestyle changes, and suggestions for lab tests that may provide further insights into your health.
settings.justify-text:
Through our HIPAA compliant web portal, you will be able to select a practitioner, look up available times and schedules, select an appropriate consultation package and fill out the necessary paperwork. Shortly after booking your first appointment, you will receive a welcome email containing a link to set your account password and begin completing intake forms.

Book an appointment
settings.expert_right_cont:
Professional Guidance

Your wellness coach will work with you to create an individual health plan.

Reliable Advice

We offer accurate, evidence-based nutritional advice.

Experienced Consultants

Our practitioners includes naturopathic doctors, certified nutritionists, holistic health counselors and clinical herbalists.

Meet Our Team
settings.interest_sec_top:
I'm interested, but not really sure this is for me...

We invite you to schedule a FREE 15-minute discovery consultation.

That way we can chat about your health concerns and discuss how a personalized nutrition plan can help you achieve your health goals. This consultation is also designed to help decide if working together is a good fit and help you plan steps.

settings.why_left_content:
We passionately believe that each person deserves their own personalized plan for protecting and optimizing their health. Wherever you are on your healing journey, pursuing your goals is a lot easier when you have the right tools for success. That’s why we created Humanized+, a membership program designed to educate, support, and empower individuals in their pursuit of healthy living.

Humanized+ Benefits Include:

  • An interactive dashboard with access to a science-driven smart tool that provides:
    • An in-depth analysis of your health through a comprehensive health questionnaire, plus functional lab testing combined with your DNA blueprint.
    • Customized action plans providing detailed diet, lifestyle, and nutrient recommendations based on your unique needs and biochemical individuality.
    • 3 different health scores (whole-body, metabolic, and toxins), each generated using cutting-edge AI technology.
  • Access to a tremendous selection of the highest-quality nutritional supplements, including practitioner-brand supplements, plus homeopathic formulas and natural body care products, all available at the most affordable prices, with free shipping and priority service.
  • Special pricing on a wide variety functional lab tests, DNA analysis, as well as on consultation services with licensed nutritionists.
  • VIP access to live nutrition experts 7 days a week, with prioritized attention by both phone and email, as well as the ability to schedule calls with our nutrition experts at times that work best for your busy schedule. Whether you have a question about a supplement or specific ingredient, are seeking advice on a particular health concern, or would like an in-depth consultation, our nutritionists are here for you every step of the way.

settings.health_score_popup:
Health Score

Your Health Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Your health score reflects your overall health status and provides a directional indicator on how your health is evolving. Using advanced technology and scientific data, we look at numerous factors in your life, including your demographics, health conditions, family history, diet and lifestyle habits, lab results, and DNA, and how they are impacting your health. Therefore, the more data you provide, the more accurate your health score and more customized your recommendations can be. Based on a scale of 0-100, a higher score is suggestive of better health. As you make positive health changes and improve your lab values, remember to update your health questionnaire so that your health score can reflect your progress.
settings.metabolic_score_popup:
Metabolic Score

Your Metabolic Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Your metabolic score reflects a deep dive into the many factors that affect your cardiovascular health, including blood sugar balance, lipid levels, blood pressure, and BMI. Also factored in is your exposure to common environmental toxins that can cause metabolic disturbances. Calculated on a scale from 0 (higher risk) to 100 (lower risk), with the data you’ve provided, this score represents a snapshot of your current likelihood of developing heart disease, diabetes, or other cardiovascular issues. Your customized recommendations include key action steps for improving your cardiometabolic health.
settings.toxin_score_popup:
Toxin Score

Your Toxin Score: ?

Complete your health questionnaire

Based on a scale from 0 (higher risk) to 100 (lower risk), your toxin score is a calculation of your estimated exposure to environmental toxins, as well as your body’s unique ability to detoxify pollutants, chemicals and other toxins. This score factors in all the information you provided, including your answers to the health questionnaire, your lab values, DNA results, as well as data gathered from air and water quality in your area. You can work to improve your toxin score by making the recommended changes to your diet and lifestyle, which can help to reduce your exposure to toxins as well as enhance your detoxification pathways.
settings.dashboard_cont:
Humanized+ provides a current data-based snapshot of your health, plus customized recommendations and action steps to get your body —and brain― the personalized support you need. Use this information to help reduce your likelihood of disease, target nutritional deficiencies, and learn how to lower the risk from toxins in your local area.

Science-based health solutions work best when you pinpoint as many contributing factors as possible. To keep your health dashboard accurate and get the most targeted recommendations, provide as much information as possible. Provide as much information as possible in the following three areas:

  • Health questionnaire

  • Lab testing

  • DNA analysis

Remember to revisit the health questionnaire every few months and have new lab work done yearly.
settings.unlock_personalized: Click hereto unlock your personalized Top Recommendations
settings.unlock_personalized_popup:
Complete your Health Questions
Your Humanized+ Health Score gives you a baseline for the current state of your body. From there our cutting edge technology is able to assess what you need to improve your health and avoid potential problems. Personalized recommendations based on your eating habits, lifestyle choices, DNA, toxin exposure, vitamin and mineral deficiencies, blood sugar balance, inflammation levels, and other factors give you actionable steps to make positive changes.

Ask A Nutritionist

Have a nutrition or supplement question? Professional advice is just a click away.
settings.ask_popup_content:
Have a nutrition or supplement-related question? Please fill out the form below with your name, email address, and your question. One of our nutrition advisors will get back to you via email in 24 hours.

If you're looking for more in-depth advice or information, consider booking an appointment with one of our nutritionists.

Schedule a time that is convenient for you, and a nutrition expert will call to answer your question.

SCHEDULE A
CONSULTATION

Make an appointment with a nutritionist for in-depth one-on-one guidance and support.
settings.consultation_content:
Nutritionist Guidance & Support

Working with a nutritionist can give you greater insights into your health, nutrition, and lifestyle habits. It can also help you understand your lab work in ways that can best support you in reaching your health goals and addressing specific health concerns. As a Humanized+ member, you will receive special pricing on all nutrition consultation services.

Book a consultation now!
settings.box1_layout:

An in-depth look into your unique biochemistry and genetic risks.

Special Members-

Shop now
settings.box3_layout_popup:
Special Members-
Only Prices

With our wide selection of over 10,000 high-quality nutritional supplements and natural body care products, you can feel confident in finding just what you need. We carry top, trusted brands that are driven by cutting-edge scientific research and are tested for purity and effectiveness.

As a Humanized+ member, you receive 35% off our exclusive in-house brand, Pathway, plus 30% off all other supplements, including many high-end practitioner brands, and 25% off our full selection of natural body care products. In addition, get free shipping on all orders over $40.

Browse all of our products or search for something specific. If you can’t find what you are looking for, please reach out. We are happy to help!

Ready to transform your health?

settings.benefit_pack1_cont: Get members-only pricing on thousands of high-end nutritional supplements and our entire selection of body care products. Also, receive special pricing on lab testing, DNA analysis, and nutrition consultations.
settings.deep_discounts:
Deep Discounts

Humanized+ members receive 35% off our exclusive in-house brand, Pathway, plus 30% off all other supplements, including many hard-to-find practitioner brands, and 25% off our full selection of natural body care products. In addition, members get free shipping on all orders over $40. Order specialty lab testing and schedule in-depth nutrition consultations at special, members-only rates.
settings.benefit_pack2_cont: Priority access to our team of nutrition experts - 7 days a week, 9 am -7 pm ET to answer your questions.
settings.vip_support:
VIP Support

Humanized+ members have many ways to easily reach a live nutrition expert to ask questions. Call us, schedule a time for us to call you, or email your questions, 7 days a week, 9 am – 7 pm ET.
settings.benefit_pack3_cont: Learn important insights into your health, receive customized diet, lifestyle and nutrient recommendations, and track progress on your interactive membership dashboard.
settings.personalized_popup:
Personalized Guidance

Your Humanized+ membership gives you exclusive access to our AI smart tool, a science-driven platform for identifying underlying physiological dysfunctions and the steps necessary to address them. The sophisticated software pulls data from your health questionnaire, zip code, lab testing and genetic analysis to provide you with 3 personalized health scores (whole-body, metabolic, and toxin) as well as evidence-based customized recommendations. As you make healthy changes over time, and update your health questionnaire and get new lab testing done, your health scores will reflect your progress and your recommendations will change as well.
settings.sign_why_sec:
Why Become a Member?

We passionately believe that each person deserves their own personalized plan for protecting and optimizing their health. Wherever you are on your healing journey, pursuing your goals is a lot easier when you have the right tools for success. That’s why we created Humanized+, a membership program designed to educate, support, and empower individuals in their pursuit of healthy living.

Sign Up Now
settings.join_content:
An interactive dashboard with access to a science-driven smart tool that provides:

  • An in-depth analysis of your health through a comprehensive health questionnaire, plus functional lab testing combined with your DNA blueprint.
  • Customized action plans providing detailed diet, lifestyle, and nutrient recommendations based on your unique needs and biochemical individuality.
  • 3 different health scores (whole-body, metabolic, and toxins), each generated using cutting-edge AI technology.
settings.sign_humani_content: With an AI-driven interactive dashboard, you now have a hub for testing, tracking, and transforming your health. Learn how to optimize your health and help guard against health risks with your customized diet, lifestyle, and nutrient recommendations. Gain insights into your total body health, metabolic health, and toxin risk and track your progress as you make healthy changes. Shop our extensive selection of high-quality supplements, schedule nutrition consultations, get personalized support, and much more!
settings.sign_humani_btm_cont:
$39/mo

100% Money Back Guarantee

Buy Now
settings.sign_humani_right_cont:
• Access to an in-depth analysis of your health through a comprehensive questionnaire, including an assessment of your all of your body systems, family history, diet and lifestyle habits, possible drug-nutrient interactions, as well as smart questions specifically generated to learn more about you.
  • The ability to easily order and link your lab testing and DNA blueprint to our AI smart tool, to give you a greater understanding of the many factors impacting your health.
  • 3 important health scores (whole-body, metabolic, and toxin), each generated using cutting-edge AI technology to provide you insights into your current health status and disease risk and designed to help you track progress over time.
  • Customized diet, lifestyle, and nutrient recommendations based on your unique needs and biochemical individuality.
  • A variety of convenient ways to connect with our team of live nutrition experts to answer your questions.
  • The ability to schedule discounted, one-on-one consultations with a Nutritionist.
settings.sign_qtn_title: Got Questions? We are happy to help!
settings.sign_qtn_content:
• Call 1-800-245-6788
  • or
  • Send us a message

settings.member_popup_content:
Initial 75-minute Telenutrition Consultation - $157

During your appointment, your nutritionist will:
  • Address your health concerns.
  • Thoroughly assess your current health and medical history
  • Discuss your Humanized recommendations including your lab work and DNA.
  • Interpret any additional lab work you may have and make recommendations for other lab tests if necessary.
  • Review your diet and lifestyle habits.
  • Look for any druginutrient interactions or depletions.
  • Discuss your health goals
  • Provide you with a personalized nutrition plan.
Book now

Follow-Up 45-minute Telenutrition Consultation - $90

During the follow-up sessions, your nutritionist will:
  • Check in regarding your progress and challenges.
  • Answer any questions that you may have.
  • Make changes to your nutrition plan if necessary.
  • Review lab work.
  • Provide support and guidance.
  • Reinforce goals.
Book now
settings.member_title: Let Us Help You Optimize Your Health.
settings.member_content: As a Humanized+ member, you receive special pricing on nutrition consultation services. Use our appointment scheduler to select a time that is convenient for you. Our nutritionists will provide recommendations and a personalized plan that encourages and supports your goals for improved health and well-being.
settings.member_table_content:
During your appointment, your nutritionist will:

  • Conduct a comprehensive review of your heath & family history.
  • Discuss your health concerns as well as your goals.
  • Review your diet, lifestyle habits, and supplement regimen
  • Alert you of any possible drug / nutrient interactions or depletions resulting from any medications that you are taking
  • Discuss your Humanized+ dashboard recommendations lab results and DNA.
  • Interpret any additional lab work that you may have and make suggestions for other lab testing, if necessary.
  • Provide you with an individualized nutrition plan.

Default.custom_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
